trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ525_02776_SEQ_00<tab>Charakha stares at you with admiration.
TEXT_STMBDZ525_02776_TODO_00<tab>Use the Oroniri kumis on the designated locations.
TEXT_STMBDZ525_02776_CHARAKHA_000_000<tab>Aha! I recognize you─you are the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> that conquered Bardam's Mettle. You must be possessed of an inhuman strength.
TEXT_STMBDZ525_02776_CHARAKHA_000_001<tab>Rare are the outsiders who win the respect of Azim's sons and daughters.
TEXT_STMBDZ525_02776_CHARAKHA_000_002<tab>We must celebrate your triumph of this most arduous of trials the Oronir way: you are to perform a sacred ritual.
TEXT_STMBDZ525_02776_CHARAKHA_000_003<tab>It is not complicated. All you must do to complete it is visit five stones in the area and sprinkle some kumis on them.

TEXT_STMBDZ525_02776_CHARAKHA_100_003<tab>You are not to do this lightly, however. With each drop of liquid that hits the stone, you must think of a goal you wish to achieve and make a vow to yourself to attain it.
TEXT_STMBDZ525_02776_CHARAKHA_000_004<tab>Once you are finished, come back to see me. Good luck!

TEXT_STMBDZ525_02776_CHARAKHA_000_005<tab>Whatever you do, be sure to keep your goals at the forefronts of your mind as you sprinkle the kumis upon the stones─that is the most important part, after all.
TEXT_STMBDZ525_02776_CHARAKHA_000_010<tab>You have finished the ritual, I take it? Very good. Then, please allow me to share with you the meaning behind this practice.

TEXT_STMBDZ525_02776_CHARAKHA_000_011<tab>You see, the five stones upon which you poured the kumis are also referred to as the “fingers of Azim.” This ritual is a way of showing him our respect and allows us to receive his guidance.

TEXT_STMBDZ525_02776_CHARAKHA_000_012<tab>If he deems our desire great enough, he will carve a path for us to achieve it. Though, that is not to say we can simply sit back and relax. We must also work hard to fulfill our dreams.
TEXT_STMBDZ525_02776_CHARAKHA_000_013<tab>Father Azim sees all and hears all. Your wishes have reached him and, should he deem you worthy, he shall grant them unto you.
